description: A module that has been registered in the CloudFormation registry as the default version

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module version to set as the default version.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module version to set as the default version.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/module/.+/[0-9]{8}$  
Update requires: Replacement

ModuleName.description: The name of a module existing in the registry.
ModuleName.markdownDescription:
The name of a module existing in the registry.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::MODULE  
Update requires: Replacement

VersionId.description: The ID of an existing version of the named module to set as the default.
VersionId.markdownDescription:
The ID of an existing version of the named module to set as the default.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9]{8}$  
Update requires: Replacement
